thread.title: Kaley Cuoco's Ex, Ryan Sweeting, Is Seeking Spousal Support
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco's Ex, Ryan Sweeting, Is Seeking Spousal Support

title: Kaley Cuoco's Ex, Ryan Sweeting, Is Seeking Spousal Support
text:
Kaley Cuoco's Ex, Ryan Sweeting, Is Seeking Spousal Support Posted yesterday at 2:00am 
ABC/Randy Holmes (LOS ANGELES) -- Kaley Cuoco filed for divorce from her husband of less than two years, tennis pro Ryan Sweeting, last month, citing irreconcilable differences, and now he wants her to pay up. 
Sweeting filed a request for spousal support from Cuoco on Thursday, according to court documents obtained by Us Weekly . 
The magazine reports that, per Cuoco's filed documents, spousal support is payable according to their prenup. 
Kaley, 29, and Ryan, 28, announced in September that they were separating after 21 months of marriage. 
Cuoco recently shot down rumors that her friendship with ex-boyfriend and Big Bang Theory co-star Johnny Galecki was the reason for the split. 
A source tells Us that one of the reasons the relationship fell a part was because of Sweeting's personal struggles and dependency on painkillers. 
"She supported him, but she said he couldn't make the commitment to get sober," notes the insider. "He'd tell her he was working on it, and instead go get wasted." 
The Big Bang Theory airs Mondays 8 pm Eastern time on CBS.
